page.title: 09THE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: THE{'CHOCOLATE BOX'}AS IT IS SOMETIMES CALLED IS OBLONG.IT IS BROWN AND HAS WINDOWS IN THE ROOF.IT ALSO HAS A LOGO OF ROBIN HOOD AND IS SITUATED ON THE CORNER OF ROSEMARY STREET AND CHESTERFIELD ROAD SOUTH.INSIDE THERE ARE 6 BADMINTON COURTS,2BASKETBALL COURTS AND 2 SQUASH COURTS.THERE ARE CANVAS CURTAINS THAT DRAW ACROSS THE HALL TO SUB-DIVIDE IT SO THAT PEOPLE CAN DO DIFFERENT ACTIVITIES ON BOTH SIDES. THEY ALSO ALLOW PENSIONERS,THE DISABLED,PLAYGROUPS AND PEOPLE OF ALL AGES TO PLAY GAMES.THERE ARE CHEAPER RATES FOR THE UNEMPLOYED DURING CERTAIN HOURS OF THE DAY. NOT ONLY ARE GAMES PLAYED BUT ALSO, THEY HAVE DISPLAYS,EXHIBITIONS AND CONCERTS. IT IS HEATED BY COAL IN THE WINTER AND BY GAS IN THE SUMMER.
